title: A Farmer's 2nd Look At Same-Sex Marriage: High Court Ruling Is 'Great Thing'
teaser: Morning Edition spoke to North Dakota farmer Edd Goerger about same-sex marriage recently. At that point, he'd expressed ambivalence; now, David Greene gets Goerger's take on Friday's big ruling.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
